p: Isaria fumosorosea strain CCM 8367 was used in this study. The strain was isolated from the pupa of the horse chestnut leaf miner, Cameraria ohridella, Deschka & DimiÄ‡ (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae) collected in the Czech Republic [ 19] and deposited in the Czech Collection of Microorganisms in Brno as a patent culture [ 20, 21].
